Description: Whether to persist intermediate dataframes - set False to reduce memory usage, but increase computation time
set the threshold for spark's ApproxQuantile function. Lower for more precise percentile operations, but increase computation time
Whether to compute scatter matrixes - set True to enable, but increase computation time
For groupby and histogram computation values, only return top {to_pandas_limit} rows to pandas to prevent local memory overload.
For string length computations, only sample {length_values_sample} rows to pandas to prevent local memory overload.
